product_name: The North Face Pink Ribbon Glacier Quarter-Zip Fleece Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face teamed up with Boarding for Breast Cancer and similar groups to create the women's limited edition Pink Ribbon Glacier Quarter-Zip Fleece Top made with lux Polartec(R) fleece. Super soft Polartec(R) Classic 100 Microfleece is highly breathable and dries quickly to minimize heat loss. Offers UPF 30 sun protection. Pink ribbon is embroidered on the left sleeve. Pink Ribbon Glacier Quarter-Zip Fleece Top from The North Face offers handwarmer pockets and a media pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face teamed up with Boarding for Breast Cancer and similar groups to create the women's limited edition Pink Ribbon Glacier Quarter-Zip Fleece Top made with lux Polartec(R) fleece.
